channel.title: Home-Assistant on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Home-Assistant on Arrans github.io

item.title: AlexxIT/go2rtc
item.description: Ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, RTMP, HTTP-FLV, WebRTC, MSE, HLS, MP4, MJPEG, HomeKit, FFmpeg, etc.

item.title: mikeroyal/Self-Hosting-Guide
item.description: Self-Hosting Guide. Learn all about locally hosting (on premises & private web servers) and managing software applications by yourself or your organization. Including Cloud, LLMs, WireGuard, Automation, Home Assistant, and Networking.

item.title: blakeblackshear/frigate
item.description: NVR with realtime local object detection for IP cameras

item.title: JurajNyiri/HomeAssistant-Tapo-Control
item.description: Control for Tapo cameras as a Home Assistant component
